original_text:
Dr Reactive’s Laboratory
Preparatevi ad una fantastica reazione dalla slot online di Dr Reactive’s Laboratory! Questo è un gioco su cui non siamo neutrali e pensiamo che la chimica tra voi e questa slot sarà esplosiva!
Questa slot sembra un gioco retrò dei cartoni animati usato per insegnare lezioni di scienze. È dotato di bobine a cascata con il cluster paga meccanico per avere più possibilità di vincere. Le epiche bobine 8×8 vi danno un sacco di simboli con cui giocare, mentre cercate di raccogliere quelle che pagano tutti i cluster più importanti. Con moltiplicatori selvaggi, giri gratis e tre jackpot progressivi da vincere, questa slot è una lezione di chimica che non vorrete saltare.
Cucinare cocktail chimici esplosivi è l’obiettivo del gioco nella slot Dr Reactive Laboratory, un insolito 8 reel, cluster paga gioco da WMS e Red 7. Atterrare un cluster di 5 o simboli corrispondenti per creare una combinazione vincente che a sua volta porta ad una cascata. 8. Atterrare combinazioni speciali di simboli per cancellare bobine, righe e simboli di basso valore. Atterra almeno 5 vittorie a cascata in successione per innescare la funzione di giri liberi dove i moltiplicatori Wild possono mandare i pagamenti a razzo fino a 10x. Entrate nel laboratorio da 20 centesimi a 100 euro per spin.
Una grafica da piccoli chimici
Rilasciate dall’innovativo sviluppatore di giochi da casinò Red7, le bobine della slot machine Dr Reactive’s Laboratory sono messe contro una misteriosa macchina. I simboli includono fiale in verde, viola, rosa e arancione, un fulmine e un filo di DNA. Si potrebbe anche notare una lettera W disegnata in stile radioattivo incandescente che funge da Wild o un atomo completo di elettroni che agisce come uno Scatter per causare due caratteristiche bonus uniche.
Questi simboli saranno, si spera, tutto ciò di cui avrete bisogno per ottenere una vittoria!
Non vediamo il dottor Reactive, che sia un lui o una lei, nella Slot che porta il suo nome. L’impostazione è il laboratorio chimico del dottore. Le bobine sono costituite da una griglia 8×8 dove troverete 3 becher colorati pieni di sostanze chimiche accanto ai simboli del fulmine e del DNA.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Non ci sono linee di pagamento tradizionali in Dr Reactive Laboratory. Per creare una combinazione vincente, è necessario atterrare un cluster di 5 o più simboli corrispondenti. Questi possono essere formati verticalmente e/o orizzontalmente. Più simboli ci sono nel cluster, maggiore è la potenziale ricompensa offerta. Se trovate 15 del simbolo del DNA in un cluster, vi intascerete un premio pari a 50 volte la vostra puntata totale.
La slot Dr Reactive Laboratory utilizza una meccanica di gioco con bobine a cascata. Dopo la creazione di una cascata vincente, i simboli di successo vengono rimossi. I nuovi simboli scendono dall’alto e viene fatta una nuova considerazione di vincita. Le cascate continuano finché viene creato un nuovo cluster vincente.
Aiutare le vostre possibilità di vincita è il simbolo W che è il jolly. Come al solito, questo sostituisce tutti i simboli standard. Questi wilds possono anche essere dotati di moltiplicatori che possono aumentare la vincita di 2x, 3x, 4x o 5x nella base. Nella felice circostanza di atterrare più di 1 moltiplicatore wild nella stessa combinazione, gli importi sono combinati per una spinta ancora maggiore.
L’atomo si unisce ai simboli standard e al carattere jolly. Questo provoca una reazione speciale quando appare accanto al simbolo del DNA. Tutti i simboli sulla bobina e sulla riga dove si trova il simbolo del DNA vengono cancellati e ne segue una nuova cascata. Una reazione del DNA assegna anche un payout pari alla vostra quota totale.
Aspettatevi un’azione potenzialmente più esplosiva quando l’atomo atterra accanto al simbolo del fulmine. Qui, tutte le copie del simbolo del valore più basso sulle bobine vengono rimosse. Anche in questo caso, segue una nuova cascata.
La funzione Free Falls offre 10 o 15 giri gratis. Si attiva atterrando 5 o più vittorie a cascata in un unico gioco a pagamento. Per ottenere i 15 giri gratis, dovrai atterrare 7 vittorie a cascata in successione. È possibile tenere sotto controllo il proprio comportamento attraverso il contatore a lato dei rulli.
Proprio come nel gioco di base, il simbolo W che rappresenta il wild è dotato di moltiplicatori. Sono più grandi durante i giri liberi, però, e possono aumentare i pagamenti di 2x, 4x, 6x, 8x o 10x. Nel gioco di base, i wild scompaiono dopo una cascata di successo. Questo non è il caso durante la funzione, però. Invece, il blocco in posizione. Il loro moltiplicatore scende di 2x ad ogni partita fino a raggiungere il minimo di 2x. Solo allora scompaiono dalla griglia.
Come parte del meccanismo Mega Drop, avrete la possibilità di atterrare uno dei jackpot Minor, Major o Epic Jackpot. Quest’ultimo offre premi fino a 200.000 euro se siete fortunati.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Il meccanismo del Cluster Pays ci farà sempre pensare alla Slot Machine Aloha! Cluster Pays di NetEnt. Questo è stato il primo gioco con questa meccanica di gioco. Se non avete ancora provato questo gioco, dovete dargli una giocata. Ha un divertente tema tiki oltre a Respins di tipo Sticky e giri gratis. Potrebbe sembrare un gioco molto diverso, ma senza dubbio troverete molte somiglianze con la slot online di Dr Reactive’s Laboratory.

raw_translation.response:
Prepare yourself for a fantastic reaction with the online slot game "Dr Reactive's Laboratory"! This is a game that we can't remain neutral about, and we believe that the chemistry between you and this slot will be explosive!

The epic 8x8 reels give you plenty of symbols to play with, while you try to collect all the most important paying clusters. With wild multipliers, free spins, and three progressive jackpots to win, this slot is a chemistry lesson you won't want to miss.

Cooking up explosive chemical cocktails is the name of the game in the "Dr Reactive Laboratory" slot, an unusual 8-reel, cluster pay game from WMS and Red7. Landing a cluster of 5 or matching symbols creates a winning combination that triggers a cascade. There are no traditional paylines in this game, and it uses a cascade reel mechanic. 

The symbols you will find on the reels include vials in green, purple, pink, and orange, a lightning bolt, and a DNA strand. You might also notice an atom symbol that acts as a wild and a scatter symbol that triggers two unique bonus features.

You can enter the laboratory and spin a minimum of €0.20 and a maximum of €100 per spin to increase your chances of winning big payouts.

Expect potentially explosive action when the atom lands next to the DNA symbol or the lightning bolt symbol. This triggers special reactions that remove low-value and same symbols, respectively. The Free Falls feature offers up to 15 free spins with increasing wild multipliers. 

The Mega Drop feature also gives players the chance to win one of the Minor, Major, or Epic jackpots, with the latter having a top prize of €200,000.

If you enjoyed this game, we recommend trying out the Aloha! Cluster Pays slot by NetEnt, the first game to use this game mechanic. It has a fun tiki theme, sticky respins, and free spins. Despite the differences, you'll find many similarities between the two games. 

Overall, "Dr Reactive's Laboratory" is a thrilling slot game that is perfect for experienced gamblers looking for a unique and exciting experience.

raw_translation.response:
Get ready for a fantastic reaction from the online slot game, Dr Reactive's Laboratory! This game is one we are not neutral about as we believe that the chemistry between you and this slot will be explosive! With cascade reels and the cluster pay mechanic, you are given more chances to win big in this retro cartoon-style slot. The epic 8×8 reels provide you with plenty of symbols to play with, as you hunt to collect those that pay out the important clusters. With wild multipliers, free spins, and three progressive jackpots to win, this slot is a chemistry lesson you won't want to skip.

Imagine entering Dr Reactive's Laboratory, the unusual 8-reel cluster pay game from WMS and Red 7, where your goal is to concoct explosive chemical cocktails. Land clusters of 5 or matching symbols to create a winning combination that triggers a cascade. Land special symbol combinations to clear reels, rows, and low value symbols. Trigger the free spins feature by landing at least 5 successive cascade wins. Here, wild multipliers can send payouts rocketing up to 10x. Enter the laboratory for bets from 20 cents up to 100 euros per spin. 

Released by the innovative casino game developer Red7, the reels of Dr Reactive's Laboratory are set against a mysterious machine. Symbols include green, purple, pink, and orange vials, a lightning bolt, and a DNA strand. You will also notice a letter W in glowing, radioactive style, which acts as the wild, and an atom complete with electrons that acts as a scatter to trigger two unique bonus features. 

There are no traditional paylines in Dr Reactive's Laboratory. To create a winning combination, you must land a cluster of 5 or more matching symbols. These can be formed vertically and/or horizontally. The more symbols in the cluster, the greater the potential reward. If you find 15 DNA symbols in a cluster, you will be awarded a prize equal to 50 times your total bet. 

The Dr Reactive Laboratory slot uses a cascade reel mechanic. After a successful cascade win, the winning symbols are removed, and new ones fall down from above, giving you a new opportunity for a win. Cascades continue until a new winning cluster is created. 

Helping your chances of winning is the W symbol, the wild. As usual, it substitutes for all standard symbols and can be equipped with multipliers that can increase your winnings by 2x, 3x, 4x, or 5x in the base game. In the happy circumstance of landing more than one wild multiplier in the same combination, the amounts are combined for an even greater boost. 

The atom symbol joins the standard symbols and the wild character. This triggers a special reaction when it appears next to the DNA symbol. All symbols on the reel and row where the DNA symbol is located are removed, and a new cascade follows. A DNA reaction also awards a payout equal to your total stake. Expect even more explosive action when the atom lands next to the lightning bolt symbol. Here, all copies of the symbol with the lowest value on the reels are removed, followed by a new cascade. 

The Free Falls function offers 10 or 15 free spins. It's activated by landing 5 or more cascade wins in a single paid game. To get 15 free spins, you'll need to land 7 successive cascade wins. You can keep track of your behaviour through the counter next to the reels. 

Just like in the base game, the W symbol that represents the wild comes with multipliers. However, they are larger during free spins and can increase payouts by 2x, 4x, 6x, 8x or 10x. In the base game, the wilds disappear after a successful cascade. This is not the case during the function, however. Instead, they stay in position. Their multiplier decreases by 2x with each game until it reaches a minimum of 2x. Only then do they disappear from the grid. 

As part of the Mega Drop mechanism, you have the chance to land one of the Minor, Major or Epic Jackpots. The latter offers prizes of up to 200,000 euros if you're lucky. 

Similar Slots 
The Cluster Pays mechanism always reminds us of NetEnt's Aloha! Cluster Pays slot machine. This was the first game with this game mechanic. If you haven't tried this game yet, you have to play it. It has a fun tiki theme with Sticky Respins and free spins. It may seem like a very different game, but there are definitely many similarities to be found with the Dr Reactive's Laboratory online slot.

Gameplay mechanics

Dr Reactive's Laboratory is an 8-reel cluster pay game from Red 7 and WMS that uses cascade reels mechanic. To create a winning combination, land clusters of 5 or more matching symbols that can be formed vertically and/or horizontally. After every successful cascade win, the winning symbols disappear, and new ones fall down from above, giving you a new opportunity for a win. Cascades continue until a new winning cluster is created. 

Symbols and paylines

There are no traditional paylines in Dr Reactive's Laboratory. Instead, you must land a cluster of 5 or more matching symbols to create a winning combination. Symbols include green, purple, pink, and orange vials, a lightning bolt, and a DNA strand. The standard wild symbol, represented by the letter W, substitutes all other symbols and can be equipped with multipliers that can increase your winnings by 2x, 3x, 4x or 5x in the base game. 

Progressive jackpots

Dr Reactive's Laboratory offers three progressive jackpots to win as part of the Mega Drop mechanism - Minor, Major and Epic Jackpots. The Epic Jackpot offers the highest prize of up to 200,000 euros if you are lucky. 

Free spin feature

With 5 cascade wins, you get 10 free spins, while landing 7 cascade wins earns you 15 free spins. During free spins, wild multipliers increase to up to 10x, but decrease by 2x each game until they reach a minimum of 2x. The wilds stay in position during this feature until their multiplier decreases to 2x. 

Symbol multipliers

The standard wild symbol in Dr Reactive's Laboratory substitutes all other symbols and can be equipped with multipliers of up to 5x in the base game. During free spins, the wild multipliers increase to up to 10x, but decrease by 2x each game until they reach a minimum of 2x. If you land more than one wild multiplier in the same combination, the amounts are combined for an even greater boost.

The reels are set against a mysterious machine, and the symbols include various coloured vials, a lightning bolt, and a DNA strand. The slot also features an atom complete with electrons that acts as a scatter to trigger two unique bonus features. 

Overall experience

Dr Reactive's Laboratory is an explosive online slot game that can provide players with decent payouts due to the cluster pay mechanic and the cascade reels. The addition of wild multipliers and free spins feature offers more chances to win big. The game has a fun retro cartoon-style theme and the Mega Drop Jackpot feature offers players the opportunity to win a huge prize. Overall, this is a fun and entertaining slot game that is worth checking out.

This game is one we are not neutral about as we believe that the chemistry between you and this slot will be explosive! With cascade reels and the cluster pay mechanic, you are given more chances to win big in this retro cartoon-style slot. The epic 8×8 reels provide you with plenty of symbols to play with, as you hunt to collect those that pay out the important clusters. With wild multipliers, free spins, and three progressive jackpots to win, this slot is a chemistry lesson you won't want to skip.

Imagine entering Dr Reactive's Laboratory, the unusual 8-reel cluster pay game from WMS and Red 7, where your goal is to concoct explosive chemical cocktails. Land clusters of 5 or matching symbols to create a winning combination that triggers a cascade. Land special symbol combinations to clear reels, rows, and low value symbols. Trigger the free spins feature by landing at least 5 successive cascade wins. Here, wild multipliers can send payouts rocketing up to 10x. Enter the laboratory for bets from 20 cents up to 100 euros per spin. 

Released by the innovative casino game developer Red7, the reels of Dr Reactive's Laboratory are set against a mysterious machine. Symbols include green, purple, pink, and orange vials, a lightning bolt, and a DNA strand. You will also notice a letter W in glowing, radioactive style, which acts as the wild, and an atom complete with electrons that acts as a scatter to trigger two unique bonus features. 

There are no traditional paylines in Dr Reactive's Laboratory. To create a winning combination, you must land a cluster of 5 or more matching symbols. These can be formed vertically and/or horizontally. The more symbols in the cluster, the greater the potential reward. If you find 15 DNA symbols in a cluster, you will be awarded a prize equal to 50 times your total bet. 

The Dr Reactive Laboratory slot uses a cascade reel mechanic. After a successful cascade win, the winning symbols are removed, and new ones fall down from above, giving you a new opportunity for a win. Cascades continue until a new winning cluster is created. 

Helping your chances of winning is the W symbol, the wild. As usual, it substitutes for all standard symbols and can be equipped with multipliers that can increase your winnings by 2x, 3x, 4x, or 5x in the base game. In the happy circumstance of landing more than one wild multiplier in the same combination, the amounts are combined for an even greater boost. 

The atom symbol joins the standard symbols and the wild character. This triggers a special reaction when it appears next to the DNA symbol. All symbols on the reel and row where the DNA symbol is located are removed, and a new cascade follows. A DNA reaction also awards a payout equal to your total stake. Expect even more explosive action when the atom lands next to the lightning bolt symbol. Here, all copies of the symbol with the lowest value on the reels are removed, followed by a new cascade. 

The Free Falls function offers 10 or 15 free spins. It's activated by landing 5 or more cascade wins in a single paid game. To get 15 free spins, you'll need to land 7 successive cascade wins. You can keep track of your behaviour through the counter next to the reels. 

Just like in the base game, the W symbol that represents the wild comes with multipliers. However, they are larger during free spins and can increase payouts by 2x, 4x, 6x, 8x or 10x. In the base game, the wilds disappear after a successful cascade. This is not the case during the function, however. Instead, they stay in position. Their multiplier decreases by 2x with each game until it reaches a minimum of 2x. Only then do they disappear from the grid. 

As part of the Mega Drop mechanism, you have the chance to land one of the Minor, Major or Epic Jackpots. The latter offers prizes of up to 200,000 euros if you're lucky.
